item.title: Get User Real Ip
item.description: It’s a pretty simple question, but in the process of information dissemination, some mistakes happen. For example, some people will say, just configure X-Real-Ip, and that’s it. Or some people will ask, what is the difference between X-Real-Ip and X-Forward-For, and what is the principle? Obviously, they misunderstood X-Real-Ip. This article will show you what X-Real-Ip is. Quick Answer X-Real-Ip is nothing. You can use My-Real-Ip, His-Real-Ip, whatever. 1server { 2 .
